changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO images (topic, icon, original) SELECT topics.id, topics.linktext, url FROM topics JOIN groups ON topics.groupid=groups.id JOIN sections ON sections.id=groups.section WHERE imagepost; UPDATE topics SET url=NULL, linktext=NULL WHERE id IN (SELECT topic FROM images);

changeSet.author: Maxim Valynskiy
changeSet.sql: GRANT INSERT,SELECT ON TABLE images TO linuxweb;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE ALL ON TABLE images FROM linuxweb;
